text: Marantochloa mildbraedii is a species of plant in the Marantaceae family. It is found in Cameroon, Central African Republic, Equatorial Guinea, Republic of Congo (Brazzaville) and Gabon.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Marantochloa mildbraedii Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.Pollard, B.J. 2004. Marantochloa mildbraedii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Marantochloa mildbraedii Downloaded on 22 August 2007.Koechlin, Jean. 1964.
